Name: Bouquet
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Honey syrup (3 parts honey to 1 water by weight)
10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Rose delicately flavours gin with a sweet and sour balance provided by honey and lemon.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2005 by Alex Pacumbo at Cocoon, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Bouquet contains 172 calories
